_meta.author: Charley Scholz, ELEV8
_meta.coauthor: Claude 4.6 Opus, Claude Code (coding assistant), Cursor (IDE)
_meta.description: Color palette presets for creative prompt engineering

presets.name: Warm Earth Tones
presets.promptFragment: warm earth tone color palette, terracotta, sienna, ochre, burnt umber, sandy beige
presets.description: Grounded natural warmth — the rich browns, tans, and burnt oranges found in clay, soil, and sunbaked landscapes

presets.name: Cool Blues
presets.promptFragment: cool blue color palette, cerulean, navy, slate blue, powder blue, icy tones
presets.description: The calming spectrum of blue — from deep navy depths to icy powder, evoking water, sky, and serenity

presets.name: Monochrome
presets.promptFragment: monochrome color palette, single hue variations, tonal range from light to dark, unified color scheme
presets.description: Variations of a single hue from lightest tint to darkest shade, creating elegant tonal unity

presets.name: Pastel
presets.promptFragment: pastel color palette, soft muted tones, light and airy, gentle lavender mint peach and cream
presets.description: Soft, desaturated tints — gentle and soothing colors that feel light, airy, and approachable

presets.name: Neon / Vibrant
presets.promptFragment: neon vibrant color palette, electric cyan, hot magenta, vivid yellow, fluorescent intensity, maximum saturation
presets.description: Maximum visual impact — electric, fluorescent colors at extreme saturation that demand attention

presets.name: Muted / Desaturated
presets.promptFragment: muted desaturated color palette, washed-out tones, low saturation, dusty faded hues, subdued palette
presets.description: Colors with the volume turned down — desaturated, dusty, and contemplative, like a scene viewed through morning fog

presets.name: Complementary (Orange-Teal)
presets.promptFragment: orange and teal complementary color palette, warm highlights against cool shadows, cinematic color grading
presets.description: Hollywood's favorite color grade — warm orange skin tones against cool teal shadows, creating maximum visual separation

presets.name: Analogous Warm
presets.promptFragment: warm analogous color palette, reds oranges and yellows, harmonious warm spectrum, sunset tones
presets.description: Adjacent warm hues on the color wheel — reds flowing into oranges into golds, like a sunset in full glory

presets.name: Analogous Cool
presets.promptFragment: cool analogous color palette, blues purples and teals, harmonious cool spectrum, twilight tones
presets.description: Adjacent cool hues on the color wheel — blues bleeding into purples into teals, like a twilight sky

presets.name: Duotone
presets.promptFragment: duotone color palette, image rendered in only two contrasting colors, bold graphic effect, high visual impact
presets.description: The entire image expressed through just two contrasting colors, creating a bold, graphic, poster-like effect

presets.name: Sepia
presets.promptFragment: sepia tone palette, warm brown monochrome, antique photograph feel, aged paper tones, vintage warmth
presets.description: The warm brownish tone of aged photographs — instantly transporting the viewer to another era

presets.name: High Contrast B&W
presets.promptFragment: high contrast black and white, pure blacks and bright whites, minimal midtones, dramatic monochrome
presets.description: Pure blacks and whites with crushed midtones — maximum graphic impact through dramatic tonal extremes
